. It was originally a market town dating from the 17th century. It is now rapidly growing as it turns into a commuter town of Dublin, as the roads have improved over the years.

Gorey is located about 65km south of Dublin and 41km north of Wexford.

Located about an hour's walk away from Gorey is the "Tara Hill" (274m) from which it is possible to overview most of the Gorey area.
